articles.title: Heavy rain in Himachal Pradesh: Five more bodies found, toll at 27
articles.description: The heaviest rainfall occurred on Saturday, claiming 21 lives. In Chamba district, three people died instantly after a house collapsed in a landslide early on Saturday morning.
articles.content: Five more bodies were found in Himachal Pradesh as the death toll due to heavy rain rose to 27 on Sunday. As many as 96 roads have also been blocked due to landslides and rolling boulders. Round-the-… [+1317 chars]

articles.title: Bilkis Bano, Mallika Begum and a Tale of Two Riots
articles.description: Bhagalpur, Bihar, and Gujarat displayed the worst of India's communal politics. How each state dealt with the aftermath, however, shows the difference between their ruling parties.
